headline.main: JAPAN OPENS DRIVE NORTH FROM CANTON; Strikes Out to Open Railway to Hankow -- Offensive Meets Fierce Resistance

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, June 1 (U.P.) -- Japanese forces massed in the Canton area of South China have struck out in a drive marking their fourth attempt in four years to open the railway north to Hankow, adding another battle area to China's far-flung war front, it was revealed tonight.
